title: Finding the cinema too loud and other sure signs you're showing your age
text:
Hugh Grant recently expressed his irritation with the volume levels in cinemas. “Am I old,” he tweeted, “or is the cinema MUCH TOO LOUD?”

Very much not alone in finding the cinema horribly noisy, Hugh – never mind Joker, what about Batman! – but we do feel duty bound to point out that this is, sorry to say, a Getting On problem.

Finding the volume nose-bleedingly intolerable (and then maybe actually heading out to find the person in the projection booth to get then to turn it down, before remembering that this is not 1976 and there is no-one in the projection booth, or anywhere on the premises aside from the popcorn dispenser) – that is what we call a Getting On Giveaway.
